programme.title: Food Factory 1
programme.desc: Discover how succulent stuffed olives get from branch to jar; how 12,000 plates of tasty tortellini are made per day; how locally-sourced ingredients make the best cranberry pumpkin-seed baguettini.

programme.title: Food Factory 1
programme.desc: Discover how traditional methods still factor into modern-day croissant production; why shredding is key to make delicious rhubarb strawberry jam; how a spice tumbler produces the best tasting stuffing.

programme.title: Engineering Repurposed 1
programme.desc: Get on board with a cool use for a Boeing 747's wings, which are now the roof of a California house, and step inside a theatre that rose like a phoenix from Industrial Revolution ashes.

programme.title: Spy in the Ocean 1
programme.desc: The camera spies' latest mission reveals the extraordinary relationships that exist among the creatures of the ocean.

programme.title: Rare Survivors - China's Iconic Wildlife 1
programme.desc: Mist swirls around the base of Shanghai's skyline. From the city, tigers and monkeys seem as unreal and distant as dragons and mermaids emerging through the mist. Yet they exist as rare survivors in an extraordinary and diverse landscape. From snow leopards to wild horses, and from alligators to elephants, China's iconic wildlife is a lot more than just pandas.

programme.title: Extreme Treks 4
programme.desc: The Simien Mountains is an exotic and dramatic landscape set in the northern corner of Ethiopia. Breath-taking views abound in this natural landscape inhabited by unique and endangered wildlife.

programme.title: Serengeti 3
programme.desc: The search for a home brings tragedy and triumph as baby hippo Mafuta faces new dangers. Crocodile Magamba defends her hatchlings, and Duma the cheetah struggles to make friends.

But this time, bad guy Thunder (Frank) is asking for their help, because Flea (Beans) is trying to take over the town on his own. / When Tag and Scooch find out Wagnes has always dreamt of becoming a famous country music singer, they decide to make her dream come true.

programme.title: Not Quite Narwhal
programme.desc: Rumors of scary sea monsters in the East End take the kids on a journey of discovering you shouldnt believe everything you hear. / Mysterious globs disturbing the ocean turn out to be the byproduct of food from Unicorn Land.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business
programme.desc: Mega Fat CEO Baby holds a game day at Baby Corp and Boss Baby must find a way to beat Mega Fat CEO Baby at his own game

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business
programme.desc: When Mega Fat tries to get Boss Baby fired while on an airplane to Pairs, Tim and Staci must prevent a baby meltdown

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business
programme.desc: When baby families are leaving town, Boss Baby and Tim battle to prove Bootsy is behind it all

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants
programme.desc: In part one of a two-part season finale, the Melvins create a final exam that George and Harold will be sure to fail: the Doom Dome. To ensure success, Melvinborg injects Melvin's cells with nanobots, giving him heightened powers. But when George and Harold find out, they crank the nanobots to the max, causing Melvin to grow into a giant! The boys enlist Captain Underpants to fight the jealous nerd, but their victory only loses the nanobots onto Piqua...

programme.title: The Croods Family Tree
programme.desc: When Gran announces its time to choose a new Thunder Sisters Queen, Ugga assumes shes got it in the bag. But after a series of challenges (the Thunder Games), it becomes clear Gran might not be ready to step down.

programme.title: The Croods Family Tree
programme.desc: Guy is always surprising Eep with romantic gestures and Eep wants to return the favor. But when Guy proves impossible to surprise, Eep has to step up her game.

programme.title: Abominable and The Invisible City
programme.desc: When a mysterious creature keeps stealing peoples prized possessions, the crew discovers the Nine-Tailed Fox, a trickster rooted in Chinese lore. Unbeknownst to Yi, she is taken on a realm-bending journey by NTF so that the Fox might pry away Yis prized violin. The crew eventually comes back together and realizes that NTF takes items people think they need to be happy. Yi was able to hold onto her violin because it truly does make her happy and is a fundamental part of who she is.

programme.title: Abominable and The Invisible City
programme.desc: While Everest is going through some typical teenager growing pains (not wanting to brush his teeth or tidy his room), a welcome distraction comes in the form of LiLi, an adorable nine-year-old whos positively obsessed with Yi, Everest, and the crews pursuits. When Everest doesnt return from a sweets-filled outing with LiLi, the crew discovers LiLis intentions might not have been so pure.

programme.title: Abominable and The Invisible City
programme.desc: Superstar-level mania sets in when the renowned and prosperity-brining creature Qilin appears in front of Yis building. In trying to protect Qilin from the mob of people hoping for their wishes to be granted, the crew is distraught when they lose track of the creature. Their distress grows upon discovering that this Qilin isnt an auspicious mythical creature at all but a nefarious robot sent by a mysterious figure.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Dragon Knight
programme.desc: There is more epic action and intrigue as Po and the Dragon Knights continue their quest to destroy the Tianshang weapons, but find themselves in treacherous waters when they are captured by pirates, one of which is out for revenge against Mr. Ping! The adventures lead them to London, where they are wanted by the Knights. Old enemies resurface and Blade will have to face one of her most challenging opponentsher mom. And somehow, Po finds himself in a chess tournament against the Queen of England!

programme.title: Turbo F.A.S.T.
programme.desc: Turbo must become a hero by saving the city from a menacing tiger beetle, who has challenged him to a race on an insane stunt-filled obstacle course.

programme.title: Turbo F.A.S.T.

When Turbo is challenged, he must go slow to try to beat the gecko at his own game.

programme.title: Dinotrux Supercharged
programme.desc: When Ty and the gang sift through the destruction left by the Dreadtrux they discover that it changed the crater in surprising ways by unleashing a huge cache of supercharger bit bugs

programme.title: The Mr. Peabody And Sherman Show
programme.desc: Peabody tries to play an Irish jig while trapped in the elevator; Mozart blows his big piano audition and lands everyone in jail.

programme.title: Casper's Scare School
programme.desc: Fang Decay Why is Thatch acting meaner than usual? He has a fang-ache! Scare Day Mantha is determined to become the first zombie ever to win the Super Boo?Scare School's ultimate scaring competition.

programme.title: Noddy Toyland Detective
programme.desc: All the toys are ready to start the exciting DareDale Challenge race, which culminates in the competitors successfully completing the Crystal Memory Game in the DareDale Caves. Before the race can start everyone is disappointed to discover that the Crystal Memory Game has been broken. Whilst Clockwork Mouse gets the game mended, Noddy must investigate who broke the game so that they don't break it again. Using his investigating skills in questioning, gathering evidence on the WhoWhatWhere Tablet and thinking, Noddy discovers that Deltoid accidentally broke the game when he was trying to memorise the crystal sorting sequence. Clever Noddy helps Deltoid remember the sequence by remembering the shapes and they are able to finish the game together. Case Closed!

programme.title: Postman Pat: Special Delivery Service
programme.desc: Ted Glenn's Cornish cousin Ned is sending him a steam engine as an alternative means to power his workshop. Pat and Jess set off to Cornwall to collect this very large special delivery in the SDS Plane whilst Ted sets about giving away all of his old inventions to the people of Greendale in order to clear out enough space for the engine. Pat and Jess meet the eccentric Ned Glenn at his workshop and wrestle with the crate containing the heavy engine to get it aboard the plane. Back in Greendale the villagers are only too delighted to take all of Ted's weird and wonderful inventions off his hands but the more inventions that go, the more gloomy Ted gets. After a trip over a very bumpy field and flight in the plane, Pat finally delivers the engine to a now very sad Ted. He's depressed because he loves to tinkering with things, and now he has nothing left to tinker with. Maybe the engine will cheer him up but when Pat takes the side off the crate, just a heap of engine parts spill out. The engine was shaken apart on the journey. Pat is very sorry but Ted is delighted. Now he has something to tinker with again! Mission accomplished!

programme.title: Fifi and the Flowertots
programme.desc: Primrose can't make her garden grow and turns to Fifi for advice. She is amazed when Fifi points out that you need to water and weed a garden. And surely she can't really mean putting that yucky compost everywhere can she?

programme.title: Raa Raa The Noisy Lion
programme.desc: Raa Raa has spotted an exciting new thing in the jungle. What could it be? As they try to get close to the "flappy fly", Raa Raa discovers that some situations call for absolute quiet not something our noisy little lion is very good at!

programme.title: Go, Dog. Go!
programme.desc: When Tag and Scooch break Gilbers ancient Golden Slipper, they embark on an adventure to a secret cave to retrieve the matching slipper. \ For community outreach day, the Race Cadets are paired with an elderly resident of Pawston. It's Tag and Scooch's job to take old dog Leo around town for a day of slow, relaxing activities. But when Leo wants to kickbarx, row and skydive, Tag and Scooch try their best to keep up.

programme.title: Not Quite Narwhal
programme.desc: When Kelp is introduced to crunchy tacos in Unicorn Land, he must use his bubble sparks to bring them back to his family underwater. / Kelps unicorn friends are going to teach him Swishbee on land. But it rains and the game is called off until Kelp shows them that playing in the water can be even more fun.

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants
programme.desc: Inspired by their favorite TV show, George and Harold along with Principal Krupp blast off to outer space, where an angry toilet awaits.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business
programme.desc: Boss tries to rename the local soccer team to "The Babies", but after Danny gets involved in the popularity race with his name, "The Hot Dogs", the town becomes divided. Boss creates a crack team of Baby Corp employees to game plan solutions to the worst outcomes.

programme.title: The Croods Family Tree
programme.desc: Struggling to find their purpose on the Betterman farm, the Croods see an opportunity to prove their worth by harvesting Phils perilous (and sticky) bounceberries.

programme.title: The Croods Family Tree
programme.desc: While the parents are away, the kids are in charge of the tree house, but when the punch monkeys invade the house, the kids find themselves out of their element.

programme.title: Abominable and The Invisible City
programme.desc: Yi and the crew are overrun with pings from humans who are frustrated by creatures they now live alongside. Just when they think theyve solved one issue, another springs up and then that original one pops up again too! Meanwhile, we see an ominous pedestal of light progressively become more cracked with each fraught human-creature relationship. At her wits end, Yi accidentally hurts Peng, Jin, and Everest with her magic. She then notices Everest fading into nothing

programme.title: DRAGONS 9 REALMS
programme.desc: Tom and the riders help Thunder, who is seeking revenge against the dragons that chased off his family.

programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On!
programme.desc: When a type of insect (Whimsy Wasps) become attracted to Trolls Village due to the Trolls joyful lifestyles, Branch must convince them to tone it down in order to avoid being descended upon by a swarm of the wasps./ For the first time in Trolls Village, a game of freeze tag has broken out without the tagger declaring themselves. Poppy races to discover the identity of the mysterious tagger, before all of Trolls Village ends up frozen

programme.title: Dew Drops Diaries
programme.desc: Marcus makes a Dew Drop-sized hot-air balloon for Phoebe and the Dews have a blast helping their kids from above, including secretly guiding Lola back to her family, before she accidentally follows Hip-Hop the frog out of the park. / Phoebe makes a pair of glasses for Bob the bird, but when seeing things clearly for the first time gets him lost, the Dews help Bob find his nest before his family arrives for a visit.

programme.title: Dew Drops Diaries
programme.desc: The Dews think a double rainbow is making their powers change, but what they discover is that they are about to graduate to a new level of Dew Dropness, with the newfound ability to float in the air! / When Reed discovers hes being assigned a family, he runs to tell Athena, only to find Athena and her house are missing! While Eden and Phoebe search for Athena, Reeds on Dew Drop duty for Athena. After successfully helping Athena's kids, Reed is assigned the family in the apartment below Athena. He now gets to join them on more adventures.

programme.title: Team Zenko Go
programme.desc: Mr. Tanaka is moving places all by himself, so Team Zenko step in to assist, and learn the importance of asking people for help. / When Sam's skateboard competition falls on the same day as her favourite creator Ken KaBlam's comic book signing, TZG secretly prevents him leaving town before she gets the chance to meet him.

programme.title: Team Zenko Go
programme.desc: When easily-distracted Luis is tasked with getting flowers for his grandmother's birthday party, TZG secretly keeps him on track. / When Rodney's honey bees escape from their apiary (artificial beehive), TZG secretly brings them back.

programme.title: Dragons: Rescue Riders
programme.desc: The Riders have to save Elbone when he's swallowed by a giant Sea Gronckle, and Dak's awful cooking might be just the thing to do it.

programme.title: Dragons: Rescue Riders
programme.desc: At a big town festival, Magnus challenges Duggard in a competition to be chief of Huttsgalor! Can the Riders help their friend keep his helmet?

programme.title: Not Quite Narwhal
programme.desc: Kelps learns about memory spark in an attempt to relive a memory of his grandmother. / Kelp and the underwater gang put on a show to showcase their imaginary sparks. As she practices, however, Scallop becomes convinced her tusk has a real spark!

programme.title: Not Quite Narwhal
programme.desc: Kelp is excited to celebrate his right of passage, breaking the ice with his horn. But when he struggles to break the ice like other narwhals, he is determined to do it the Kelp way.

programme.title: Spirit Riding Free
programme.desc: Lucky Spirit and Turo team up to help save an abused horse

programme.title: Spirit Riding Free
programme.desc: Lucky enlists Abigail Turo Snips and their horses to help plan a surprise birthday party for Pru that goes disastrously wrong

programme.title: The Adventures Of Puss In Boots
programme.desc: Puss and the gang attempt to find Sino for help to stop the earthquakes and end up on a dangerous journey to The Forbidden Citadel

programme.title: The Adventures Of Puss In Boots
programme.desc: The real Sino is revealed, and Puss finds out that the only way to undo the events leading to the end of the World is to go back to before he entered San Lorenzo

programme.desc: Krupp's campers take on rich rivals in a hoity-toity boat race that also features a revenge-obsessed giant salamander. Paging Captain Underpants!

programme.desc: All the toys are ready to start the exciting DareDale Challenge race, which culminates in the competitors successfully completing the Crystal Memory Game in the DareDale Caves. Before the race can start everyone is disappointed to discover that the Crystal Memory Game has been broken. Whilst Clockwork Mouse gets the game mended, Noddy must investigate who broke the game so that they don't break it again. Using his investigating skills in questioning, gathering evidence on the WhoWhatWhere Tablet and thinking, Noddy discovers that Deltoid accidentally broke the game when he was trying to memorise the crystal sorting sequence. Clever Noddy helps Deltoid remember the sequence by remembering the shapes and they are able to finish the game together. Case Closed!

programme.title: Postman Pat: Special Delivery Service
programme.desc: Ted Glenn's Cornish cousin Ned is sending him a steam engine as an alternative means to power his workshop. Pat and Jess set off to Cornwall to collect this very large special delivery in the SDS Plane whilst Ted sets about giving away all of his old inventions to the people of Greendale in order to clear out enough space for the engine. Pat and Jess meet the eccentric Ned Glenn at his workshop and wrestle with the crate containing the heavy engine to get it aboard the plane. Back in Greendale the villagers are only too delighted to take all of Ted's weird and wonderful inventions off his hands but the more inventions that go, the more gloomy Ted gets. After a trip over a very bumpy field and flight in the plane, Pat finally delivers the engine to a now very sad Ted. He's depressed because he loves to tinkering with things, and now he has nothing left to tinker with. Maybe the engine will cheer him up but when Pat takes the side off the crate, just a heap of engine parts spill out. The engine was shaken apart on the journey. Pat is very sorry but Ted is delighted. Now he has something to tinker with again! Mission accomplished!

programme.title: Fifi and the Flowertots
programme.desc: Primrose can't make her garden grow and turns to Fifi for advice. She is amazed when Fifi points out that you need to water and weed a garden. And surely she can't really mean putting that yucky compost everywhere can she?

programme.title: Raa Raa The Noisy Lion
programme.desc: Raa Raa has spotted an exciting new thing in the jungle. What could it be? As they try to get close to the "flappy fly", Raa Raa discovers that some situations call for absolute quiet not something our noisy little lion is very good at!

programme.title: Go, Dog. Go!
programme.desc: When Tag and Scooch break Gilbers ancient Golden Slipper, they embark on an adventure to a secret cave to retrieve the matching slipper. \ For community outreach day, the Race Cadets are paired with an elderly resident of Pawston. It's Tag and Scooch's job to take old dog Leo around town for a day of slow, relaxing activities. But when Leo wants to kickbarx, row and skydive, Tag and Scooch try their best to keep up.

programme.title: Not Quite Narwhal
programme.desc: When Kelp is introduced to crunchy tacos in Unicorn Land, he must use his bubble sparks to bring them back to his family underwater. / Kelps unicorn friends are going to teach him Swishbee on land. But it rains and the game is called off until Kelp shows them that playing in the water can be even more fun.

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants
programme.desc: Inspired by their favorite TV show, George and Harold along with Principal Krupp blast off to outer space, where an angry toilet awaits.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business
programme.desc: Boss tries to rename the local soccer team to "The Babies", but after Danny gets involved in the popularity race with his name, "The Hot Dogs", the town becomes divided. Boss creates a crack team of Baby Corp employees to game plan solutions to the worst outcomes.

programme.title: The Croods Family Tree
programme.desc: Struggling to find their purpose on the Betterman farm, the Croods see an opportunity to prove their worth by harvesting Phils perilous (and sticky) bounceberries.

programme.title: Chain Mail
programme.desc: A usual chain mail is forwarded to a group of people. Some pass it while others ignore. One dies and is followed by series of sudden and unexplainable deaths of others. Soon after, a revelation begins to unfold, the chain mail is cursed and so Sandra (Shy Carlos) has to find the origin and mystery behind to stop the misfortunes.

programme.title: Beks Days of Our Lives
programme.desc: Richardson (Chad Kinis), Reggie (Lassy Marquez) and Melvin (MC Calaquian) have have been friends for many years despite working in different fields. They decided to go on a vacation, finding themselves in hilarious situations. Everything's going perfectly well until the night Reggie collapses.

programme.title: Masamang Ugat
programme.desc: Two brothers are separated after their mother dies. One becomes a cop (Mikey Arroyo), the other an assassin (Ace Vergel). The cop ambitiously wants to bring down a drug lord supported by politicians, while the assassin works for the same drug lord.

programme.title: Spellbound

programme.desc: A team of scientists braves the dangers of the rain forest in search of a flower that contains a youth serum.

programme.title: Pixels
programme.desc: An unlikely group of former '80s video game champions step up to save the world from an alien invasion in this visually spectacular action-adventure.

programme.title: Peter Rabbit
programme.desc: Peter Rabbit, the mischievous and adventurous hero who has captivated generations of readers, now takes on the starring role of his own cute, contemporary comedy with attitude.

programme.title: Collateral
programme.desc: A cab driver finds himself the hostage of an engaging contract killer as he makes his rounds from hit to hit during one night in LA. He must find a way to save both himself and one last victim.

programme.title: Minority Report
programme.desc: In the future, criminals are caught before the crimes they commit, but one of the officers in the special unit is accused of one such crime and sets out to prove his innocence.

programme.title: Seattle Superstorm
programme.desc: When a massive storm threatens the Pacific Northwest, a family must find each other and work together to put a stop to the storm before it spreads beyond their control and annihilates the planet!

programme.title: Star Trek: Insurrection
programme.desc: In this most colorful and relaxed installment of Paramount's longest running series, Captain Picard leads his multicultural starship crew in a rebellion to save a planet from the very Federation they serve so proudly.

programme.title: Dragonheart: Vengeance
programme.desc: Lukas (Jack Kane), a young farmer whose family is killed by savage raiders in the countryside, sets out on an epic quest for revenge.

programme.title: Miami Vice
programme.desc: In Miami Vice, undercover detectives played by Jamie Foxx and Colin Farrell navigate danger, crime, and seduction in a gritty, stylish update of the iconic TV series. Also stars Gong Li.

programme.title: Total Recall
programme.desc: Welcome to Rekall, the company that can turn your dreams into real memories. For Douglas Quaid, even though he's got a beautiful wife whom he loves, the mind-trip sounds like the perfect vacation from his frustrating life.

programme.title: The Last Dragonslayer
programme.desc: In a world where magic is waning and technology prevails, 15-year-old Jennifer Strange runs a magician employment agency and discovers the last dragon is being hunted.

programme.title: Twilight
programme.desc: A troubled teenage girl moves in with her dad in a small isolated town. She falls for a mysterious loner with a shocking secret - could he be anything to do with the local murders that have started taking place?

programme.title: Collateral
programme.desc: A cab driver finds himself the hostage of an engaging contract killer as he makes his rounds from hit to hit during one night in LA. He must find a way to save both himself and one last victim.

programme.title: Minsan Pa Natin Hagkan ang Nakaraan ep 2
programme.desc: A woman who was severely broken by her greatest love finds love again in an older man who did everything to put her back together. Just when she thought her life is finally back to normal, her greatest love comes back, determined to work for her forgiveness and win her backeven if it means breaking her family apart

programme.title: Totoy Bato ep 82
programme.desc: Totoy Bato explores the origins, the pathos of the character Totoy. All the different battle he went through (terrorist, revenge for his wife, corruption, prejudice and for love) defines him as a character.

programme.title: Da Pers Family ep 15
programme.desc: A story of a couple who preserves the family bakery business legacy from closure. Now the couples children, volunteers to step in and help the business. Are the parents willing to accept change and innovations of the new generation?

programme.title: Kurdapya ep 10
programme.desc: Kurdapya tells the story of long-lost twins, KURING & DAPHNE. They meet after a strange accident and discover that they lead extremely different lives. Kuring grew up with the cruel extended family in the province while Daphne is an undervalued publishing executive in the city. Both women want to get out of their current realities, so they decide to switch lives by pretending to be each other.

programme.title: Brush ep 8
programme.desc: Alex becomes a famous makeup artist because of her mothers unique brush set but will face a challenge when all her clients begin to die, one by one.

programme.title: Ghost Adventures S2 ep 7

programme.title: No. 82 Haunted House
programme.desc: The eldest son of the Mu family dies suddenly on the eve of his wedding. To rest his soul, a maid Xiao Die is made to marry and then buried alive with him. Since then, Mu's house is haunted by a series of terrifying incidents, and the family's secrets are gradually unveiled when Mus youngest daughter return home from abroad with her boyfriend.

programme.title: Sinister Doll
programme.desc: A teenager, Pelangi, chances upon a banana tree plantation which is guarded by a mysterious old man. Apart from finding out that a young girl was buried with her favourite doll in this banana plantation decades ago, Pelangi also uncovers a horrifying secret about her death

programme.title: 3AM
programme.desc: A taxi driver who is constantly judging others by his own standards, also reads into their every move and sets out to help victims in his own way. When a woman he likes seems to be bullied by her son, he goes about setting things right for her, even resorting to turning himself into a cold-blooded serial killer

programme.title: Bahay Na Pula
programme.desc: Jane and her husband Marco go to the ancestral house that Jane inherited from her grandmother. As they move into the house, Jane starts to experience horrifying events and her belly mysteriously grows bigger every day, as if she has gotten pregnant all of a sudden

programme.title: Sinister
programme.desc: Jia Hao and his friends gather to celebrate his birthday at a villa. However, the festivities take a dark turn when they connect to a deadly VR game in which they must light candles and dodge ghosts to survive. Tragedy strikes as two of his friends fall victim to the escalating horrors within, plunging them all deeper into a chilling nightmare.

programme.title: Red Rain
programme.desc: Based on true events, a young scientist who specialises in the study of aliens and extraterrestrials sets out to uncover the mystery behind a series of strange occurrences in Kerala.

programme.title: No. 82 Haunted House
programme.desc: The eldest son of the Mu family dies suddenly on the eve of his wedding. To rest his soul, a maid Xiao Die is made to marry and then buried alive with him. programme.title: The Ones You Didn't Burn
programme.desc: After their father's death, Nathan and his sister return to their family home to prepare it for sale. While there, Nathan discovers that the land was stolen from the ancestors of two women accused of witchcraft. As he delves deeper, he uncovers an occult conspiracy linked to their father's death which now threatens them both.

programme.title: Ten Minutes to Midnight
programme.desc: Amy gets bitten by a rabid bat during her last graveyard shift as a veteran punk rock disc jockey. When a storm traps Amy, her mysterious replacement and an anxious staff inside their small-town radio station, reality starts to distort as they go deeper into the graveyard shift

programme.title: Bunshinsaba: Hoichi the Earless
programme.desc: You Mei brings home an abandoned doll found on the street. Little does she know that it is possessed by an evil spirit which causes the sudden death of her colleague. You Mei seeks help from a ghost hunter who unleashes the pencil spirit to fight against the evil spirit, unfortunately leading to a series of terrifying events

programme.title: Sa Haba Ng Gabi
programme.desc: Two housemaids and a driver take shelter at their employer's mansion when a zombie outbreak happens one night. Can they all survive the night?

programme.title: Red Snow
programme.desc: Olivia, an outstanding vampire romance novelist, longs to encounter a real vampire. Her wish comes true when Luke turns up at her remote snowbound cabin seeking for help. However, her dream transforms into a chilling nightmare on Christmas Eve when Luke's vampire companions track him down...

programme.title: Sinister
programme.desc: Si Nan and her husband travel to Kuala Lumpur for a vacation to relieve her pregnancy stress. However, she soon uncovers his evil plan to turn their child into a 'Luk Krok' for profit, which puts her in grave danger. With the help of the hotel ghosts, she manages to flee and alert the police to arrest him, finally giving birth to her child.

programme.title: C Dans L'air
programme.desc: All the latest major events, presented, explained and analysed! Special guests and journalists in the studio analyse both the latest news but also other controversial issues to give us a better understanding of the social, political and cultural events occurring around us.

programme.title: Passe-Moi Les Jumelles
programme.desc: An invitation to take a break and dream. On the line-up: emotions, encounters, travelling, favourites and breathtaking landscapes...

programme.title: Bleu Ocean
programme.desc: The legendary Hawaiki Nui Va'a outrigger canoe race brings together teams from around the world each year. In Moorea, a new team aims for the top 20, driven by their unity and the hope of joining the legends.

programme.title: Une Brique Dans Le Ventre
programme.desc: Cedric and Virginie visit the region of Liege to discover the stunning transformation of a host house. Weekend in Belgium, on the edge of the forest of Soignes, at the Mix hotel before going to see Agnes's house in Bordeaux. Finally: how to install a bath, with Amandine and Robert.

programme.title: Les 100 Lieux Qu'il Faut Voir
programme.desc: The tracks and trails of Provence are home to a wealth of treasures. From the limestone scenery of the Verdon Gorge, through the lowlands of Fayence and its pretty hill-top villages, to the Esterel Massif, we follow the GR49 long distance footpath in all its amazing beauty.

programme.title: 6H Info

programme.title: Telematin
programme.desc: The latest news and laughter, 7 days a week With Flavie Flament and Julien Arnaud on weekdays, Maya Lauque and Damien Thevenot at weekends.

programme.title: Le Gout Des Rencontres En Nouvelle-Aquitaine
programme.desc: Exploring rural land and culinary traditions! Chef Justine Piluso criss-crosses Nouvelle-Aquitaine to meet men and women in the region to learn about their products, their tastes and the dishes that they prepare.

programme.title: Slam
programme.desc: Three contestants compete in a game of arrow crosswords, trying to complete the grids by finding the answers to the definitions provided. But to have access to those definitions, they first need to answer questions that all share one common characteristic: the response is always a letter.

programme.title: Le Telejournal De Radio-Canada

programme.title: Rocky & Lily : C'est Dans La Bote !
programme.desc: Each day, Rocky and Lily receive a new box in the studio. But what's inside? One thing is certain, it's bound to contain a surprise that will lead them to discover a host of very different subjects: from guitars to trolls and even how to sort your waste for recycling!

programme.title: Kididoc
programme.desc: Kidi, a kind-hearted artificial intelligence, guides Pomme and Fix on their journey through Kidi-World. From dinosaurs to the Chteau de Versailles, the human body to the history of aviation: Kidi-World is not only an adventure-filled wonderland but also, and above all, a means of finding the answer to every question.

programme.title: Bande De Sportifs !
programme.desc: The intrepid journalist, Theo, goes out to meet young athletes to get an introduction to their disciplines. Each sport has its own unique rules, equipment and history.

programme.title: Bande De Sportifs !

programme.title: 1001 Mondes Antiques
programme.desc: Braillard, Colombe and Lablatte have discovered a way of travelling back through ancient eras and civilisations. They embark on a journey back in time, passing through popular civilisations such as ancient Egypt and Greece, as well as sub-Saharan Africa, the Middle East and Mesopotamia.

programme.desc: Programme summary: the resilient gardener; courses for those who want to become ecological transition professionals; the Logis de Chaligny; ''Don't panic'' visits Sophie and Thierry.

programme.title: Tv5Monde, Le Journal
programme.desc: All the national and international news from the TV5MONDE news staff.

programme.title: Tempete
programme.desc: Zoe grows up on a stud farm and her only dream is to become a jockey. Her mare Tempete is her best friend. But they have an accident one stormy evening. Zoe is left paraplegic. She clings on for years and tries to achieve the impossible of fulfilling her destiny.

programme.title: Panier De Crabes
programme.desc: A city-dweller in his 30s, who is recovering from burnout, stops next to a wild lake. Whereas he thought that he had found solitude and tranquillity, the place turns out to be not as calm and isolated as it appeared.

programme.title: Cerebrum
programme.desc: Suspicion falls on the brother of one of Henri's former patients, who had threatened him. Marine and William are finding it increasingly hard to cope with their mother's disappearance. Simone and Danno step up their efforts in an investigation they'd expected to be simple, but so far they're getting nowhere.

programme.title: Cerebrum
programme.desc: Despite his grief Henri manages to keep going. Firstly with his son William, who's starting to worry him, and with his patients who need him. But Henri is still wary about revealing the identity of his patients, notably those he has doubts about, claiming a duty of professional secrecy.

programme.title: Nos Terres Gourmandes
programme.desc: Journey to Bugey, discovering the land of Cerdon. This sparkling wine, white or rose, is made of fine bubbles and ancestral know-how unique to the region.

programme.title: Biquefarre
programme.desc: Forty years after ''Farrebique'', Georges Rouquier returns to visit his cousins, who are farmers in Aveyron. In the 1940s, he filmed their day-to-day lives. Since then, everything has changed: farming has become an industry, you have to expand and diversify to survive or die.
November 2030. It's 48C in the classroom. Impossible to do any teaching.

programme.title: Sauvage
programme.desc: 2043. The Mediterranean Sea. Melissa, accompanied by her dog, works on the ''Rainbow'', her connected yacht. The young woman sells the plastic she collects to the global recycling exchange. One day she saves a little monkey from drowning. An encounter that changes her life.

programme.title: Anghel Na Walang Langit
programme.desc: Vina Morales played two very demanding roles. Two women unrelated and who have never met, but looking very much alike, found their lives entertained when the people close to them mistook them for one another.

programme.title: Brown Ninja
programme.desc: Jun (Dante Varona) barely survives a massacre that wipes out his whole family. He was found by a blind, old man in the woods and is nursed back to health. The old man also teaches him the secrets of being a ninja. Jun makes use of his new skills to find his family's killers and bring them to justice.

programme.title: Miguelito (Batang Rebelde)
programme.desc: Mayor Ven Herera (Eddie Garcia) is grooming his only son Miguelito "Mike" Herera (Aga Mulach) to be his predecessor. Mike, however, has other plans and live a happy go lucky life.

programme.title: Send In The Clowns
programme.desc: Tito, Vic and Joey play the brothers Roberto, Icardo, and Rodrigo. Tired of getting fired from different odd jobs, they decide to make use of their ability to make people laugh by working as clowns in a carnival.

programme.title: Hindi Pa Tapos Ang Laban
programme.desc: In a world where the most corrupt are the most powerful, is there a room a good mans quest for justice to succeed? The undisputed King of Action takes on the role of a modern day crusader in this exciting, action packed movie that pits the powers of goodness against the forces of evil.

programme.title: Isang Tanong, Isang Sagot
programme.desc: Jason played the role of a rich and bratty student who fell in love with one of his maids, played by the lovely Donna Cruz. Surprised at the turn of events, he tried to hide his feelings by being unkind to the girl.

programme.title: Si Mokong, Si Astig At Si Gamol
programme.desc: Mokong and Astig were former street kids who now had wards of their own. They used their wits to support them with all types of scam.

programme.title: Bakit Bughaw Ang Langit?
programme.desc: Why is the sky blue? Why do we love the people we love? These are questions no one can answer. Because is just is.

programme.title: Lagablab Sa Paraiso
programme.desc: A nurse and her cousin, a nightclub dancer, a honeymooning couple and two male prisoners. Survivors of a shipwreck, they are trapped together in an island. Of different backgrounds and personalities, can they set aside their differences to survive roughing it up in this island?

programme.title: Ang Pumatay Ng Dahil Sa'yo
programme.desc: Sergeant Emilio Sanchez is a dedicated military man. He believes that Filipinos should stand on their own and not be taken by the Americans.

programme.title: Lihim
programme.desc: Bianca and her friends sailed off to the pristine and beautiful Palawan for a few days of fun. Living in the city had made them hungry for the isolation an island resort offers. But then, tragedy struck just when they were starting to have fun.

programme.title: Row 4, The Baliktorians
programme.desc: Aruy (Dennis Padilla) and Aguy (Andrew E), heirs to a 10 million fortune, on a condition that they'll able to graduate. If not, the money would go to the school with so much at stake.

programme.title: The Carbonaro Effect: Double Takes - Back To Fight Or Flight
programme.desc: Michael reanimates a chameleon fish, reboots lengthy corks, remakes the airport bird man, and more with all-new reactions.

programme.title: The Carbonaro Effect: Double Takes - Back To The Ice
programme.desc: Michael rehashes a potato laser, re-designs an emergen-suit, and takes another shot on the ice. All with new reactions!

programme.title: Georgie & Mandy's First Marriage S1 1
programme.desc: In the series premiere, Georgie and Mandy get fed up staying with her parents and reconsider their living situation after a fight with Mandys mom, Audrey.

programme.title: Impractical Jokers S5 7
programme.desc: The guys pose as crummy cashiers at a grocery store and then head to the mall for a touching game involving laser pointers. Plus, the loser is soaked with embarrassment after making it clear to some swimmers that he's #1.

programme.title: The Carbonaro Effect S5 11
programme.desc: At Michael's fireworks stand, he's got everything from exploding fruit to levitation sparklers. And at a Hemp store, Michael shows off his innovations in hemp technology. Plus, a time capsule completely blows one man's mind!

programme.title: The Carbonaro Effect S5 12
programme.desc: Michael tries new foods like shape-shifting pasta and never-ending soup! Then it's off to a vinyl shop for a record-breaking illusion, and later, Michael tries to convince his coworker to explore a new plant.

programme.title: World's Dumbest S15 7
programme.desc: The curtain goes up and IQs go down as truTV brings you 20 of the dumbest performers ever to grace the stage. You'll see a Nutella-covered artist, the longest (and worst) death scene in film history, and a Japanese game show you have to see to believe. Reviewing the performances is our celebrity cast, including Danny Bonaduce, Judy Gold, Kevin McCaffrey, and Brendon Walsh.

programme.title: My Hero Academia Season 1 Episode 4
programme.desc: At the entrance exam, Izuku falls behind as the other students defeat faux villains left and right. Will he be able to get enough points to pass?

programme.title: My Hero Academia Season 1 Episode 5
programme.desc: It's Izuku's first day of high school, and he still can't control his new Quirk. Will he make it to the second day of school with his eccentric new teacher?

programme.title: My Hero Academia Season 1 Episode 6
programme.desc: Izuku somehow gets through his first day of school and falls into a regular schedule of classes and training at U.A. In their first class with All Might

programme.title: My Hero Academia Season 1 Episode 7
programme.desc: Izuku is up against Katsuki in their first class with All Might! Can he and Uraraka beat the villain team of Katsuki and Tenya before time runs out?

programme.title: My Hero Academia Season 1 Episode 8
programme.desc: After the combat training lesson, the students and All Might reflect on their matches as they think about their next steps.

programme.title: My Hero Academia Season 1 Episode 9
programme.desc: Class 1-A has to elect a class representative, and everyone wants the job! How will they choose? And what lies in wait for them at the next class?

programme.title: My Hero Academia Season 1 Episode 10
programme.desc: Villains have attacked USJ, and it's up to Class 1-A to stop them. What are the villains after? Will All Might be able to save the day again?

programme.title: My Hero Academia Season 1 Episode 11
programme.desc: The students of Class 1-A are up against the League of Villains. Will they survive long enough for help to arrive?

programme.title: My Hero Academia Season 1 Episode 12
programme.desc: All Might has finally shown up, but will he be able to defeat Nomu and save the day?!

programme.title: My Hero Academia Season 1 Episode 13
programme.desc: As the battle at USJ winds down, Izuku and All Might think about its repercussions. Meanwhile, the villains slink home to plan their next move.

programme.title: Solo Leveling Season 1 Episode 1
programme.desc: Over a decade ago, a pathway called a "gate" appeared, which connected this world to another dimension. People called those who fought against the monsters on the other side of the gate "hunters."

programme.title: Solo Leveling Season 1 Episode 2
programme.desc: Jinwoo and the others are exploring a low-ranked dungeon, and they step into a temple dungeon they've never seen before. What awaits them inside are three rules, along with a monster that sends them into despair beyond fear.

programme.title: Solo Leveling Season 1 Episode 3
programme.desc: Jinwoo remained alone in the temple dungeon to save what's left of his party.

programme.title: Solo Leveling Season 1 Episode 4
programme.desc: Jinwoo enters an instance dungeon from the entrance of a subway and levels up as he defeats monsters.

programme.title: Solo Leveling Season 1 Episode 5
programme.desc: Hwang Dongsuks party is short on their member quota to raid a C-rank dungeon. Jinwoo, along with another member, Yoo Jinho, join them in bolstering their numbers and the party makes easy work of the monsters and proceeds on.

programme.title: Solo Leveling Season 1 Episode 6
programme.desc: It seemed like the raid of the C-rank dungeon was going well.

programme.title: Solo Leveling Season 1 Episode 7
programme.desc: While clearing the C-rank dungeon, Jinwoo annihilates every member of Hwang Dongsuk's party, who had tried to kill him for personal gains.

programme.title: Solo Leveling Season 1 Episode 8
programme.desc: Jinwoo has been looking for the item displayed in the window, the Elixir of Life, for his sick mother. But the quest to obtain this item is too difficult for Jinwoo that it would be nearly suicidal to attempt.

programme.title: Solo Leveling Season 1 Episode 9
programme.desc: At B20:C20r's Association, Jinwoo is reunited with Song Chiyul, Lee Joohee, Kim Sangshik, and Kang Jeongho, who have survived the Cartenon Temple. And he goes to explore the D-rank dungeon with Kang Taeshik and the others from the Surveillance Team.

programme.title: Solo Leveling Season 1 Episode 10
programme.desc: After the battle with Kang Taeshik, Jinwoo survives the tragedy once again. However, Woo Jinchul warns him that Hwang Dongsoo, an S-rank hunter, may be after Jinwoo's life.

programme.title: Solo Leveling Season 1 Episode 11
programme.desc: Out of the blue, a "job-change quest" pops up in Jinwoo's window. Feeling that it may help him get stronger, Jinwoo sets foot into a gate.

programme.title: Solo Leveling Season 1 Episode 12
programme.desc: Despite being cornered, Jinwoo manages to defeat the Crimson Knight, Igris. Without a moment of respite, another window pops up to announce a new quest.

programme.title: Jujutsu Kaisen Season 1 Episode 1
programme.desc: Ryomen Sukuna

programme.title: Jujutsu Kaisen Season 1 Episode 2
programme.desc: Itadori wakes up in an unfamiliar room and before him rests Gojo Satoru, a teacher at Jujutsu High, who declares Itadori's secret execution has been decided upon. Gojo presents Itadori with two options. He can be executed immediately, or he can hunt down all 20 of Ryomen Sukuna's fingers and die after absorbing all of them...

programme.title: Jujutsu Kaisen Season 1 Episode 3
programme.desc: Itadori, Fushiguro, and Gojo head out to meet up with the third first year, Kugizaki Nobara. Thereafter they head to an abandoned building where Gojo tasks Itadori and Kugizaki with exorcising the curses lurking inside. Once inside the building Itadori and Kugizaki split up to look for the curses and Kugizaki faces off against a cunning curse that takes a child hostage.

programme.title: Jujutsu Kaisen Season 1 Episode 4
programme.desc: An emergency breaks out at a juvenile detention center and Itadori, Fushiguro, and Kugisaki are dispatched to handle it. Their mission is to verify and rescue any survivors left inside with the curse womb that could develop into a special grade cursed spirit. Itadori and the others storm in to find a merciless reality waiting for them. Immediately thereafter, Kugisaki disappears and the special grade cursed spirit appears beside Itadori and Fushiguro.

programme.title: Jujutsu Kaisen Season 1 Episode 5
programme.desc: After retreating outside the juvenile detention center, Fushiguro notices the death of the special grade cursed spirit. The very next moment Ryomen Sukuna appears beside him, and rips Itadori's heart from his body to take him hostage. Fushiguro begins fighting Sukuna to prevent Itadori from dying when he regains control, but he becomes painfully aware of the difference in their strength

programme.title: Jujutsu Kaisen Season 1 Episode 6
programme.desc: Gojo stews in his frustration over Itadori's death. Both Fushiguro and Nobara are depressed by their teammate's death, but they begin their special training with the second year students to get stronger. Meanwhile, Geto and the others begin to make their move. And during all of that, the dead Itadori...

programme.title: Jujutsu Kaisen Season 1 Episode 7
programme.desc: While in transit Gojo is suddenly attacked by the special grade cursed spirit Jogo. After launching several attacks that never hit--Jogo comes face to face with Gojo's strength. In an instant Gojo returns to Jujutsu High and easily picks up mid-training Itadori which causes Jogo's anger to erupt. He takes his next move, to which Gojo

programme.title: Jujutsu Kaisen Season 1 Episode 8
programme.desc: While they're training for the exchange event, Kugisaki and Fushiguro come face to face with Kyoto's Jujutsu High second years - Zen'in Mai and Todo - who challenge them to a fight. Todo overwhelms Fushiguro with physical strength. Meanwhile, Kugisaki is disgusted by Mai's comments and says something to provoke her

programme.title: Jujutsu Kaisen Season 1 Episode 9
programme.desc: Yoshino Junpei skips school to go to a movie theater, but then he witnesses the classmates who bullied him getting their faces transfigured and dying. He chases after the culprit and calls out to them. Later, Itadori and the ex-salaryman first-grade jujutsu sorcerer, Nanami Kento, storm into the scene of the crime within the theater and encounter two cursed spirits.

programme.title: Jujutsu Kaisen Season 1 Episode 10
programme.desc: Itadori is placed in charge of investigating Yoshino, so he turns to his assistant supervisor, Ijichi for a plan. Their plan to have a low-level curse attack Yoshino and gauge his response fails, so Itadori speaks to him directly. After watching Itadori ultimately drive away the teacher he hated, Yoshino decides to hear him out. Meanwhile, Nanami has pinned down Mahito's base and he delves into the underground sewers to face Mahito.

programme.title: Jujutsu Kaisen Season 1 Episode 11
programme.desc: Mahito corners Nanami, but he releases the limiter on his cursed energy, destroying the wall of the underground channel with Ratio Technique: Collapse, and causing rubble to rain down upon them. Meanwhile, Itadori makes contact with Yoshino and they hit it off after talking about movies. He meets Yoshino's mother, and after being invited into their home, more is revealed...

programme.title: Jujutsu Kaisen Season 1 Episode 12
programme.desc: Mahito deftly uses Yoshino's admiration toward him to make him fight Itadori. Yoshino races toward vengeance and Itadori exchanges blows with him to try and make him explain his motive, which leads to him learning the cruel truth from Yoshino's lips.

programme.title: Jujutsu Kaisen Season 1 Episode 13
programme.desc: Nanami steps in at the last second to save Itadori from Mahito's blow. Then Itadori and Nanami match their attacks together to ensure they can exorcise Mahito. Mahito pulls out his transfigured humans in an attempt to mentally drive Itadori into a corner, but Itadori manages to overcome them. As Mahito grows trapped under their rain of blows he senses his pending death

programme.title: Jujutsu Kaisen Season 1 Episode 14
programme.desc: After escaping from Itadori and Nanami, Mojito reunites with Geto and the others to try and move their plan forward. Meanwhile, Jujutsu High is about to host its Kyoto Sister School Exchange Event. Fushiguro, Kugisaki and the second years Maki, Toge, and Panda all meet up to greet Todo and the other Kyoto students on arrival. Sparks immediately start to fly when Gojo rushes in late to the meetup and presents his surprise

programme.title: Jujutsu Kaisen Season 1 Episode 15
programme.desc: The Kyoto Sister School Exchange Event's group battle begins. Kyoto's Todo rushes to attack the Tokyo students, but Itadori takes on the role of stopping him and faces off against him. Itadori's overwhelmed by Todo's power, but suddenly Todo asks him what kind of woman is his type

programme.title: Jujutsu Kaisen Season 1 Episode 16
programme.desc: Todo points out that Itadori's Divergent Fist is a technique that won't work against special grades. When Itadori genuinely accepts his advice, Todo decides to face him and guide him with his full might. Meanwhile, Kugisaki picks a fight with Kyoto's Nishimiya. From the sidelines Mechamaru fires an attack at Panda, sparking the start of their battles with Kugisaki against Nishimiya and Panda against Mechamaru.

programme.title: Jujutsu Kaisen Season 1 Episode 17
programme.desc: The Exchange Event's Group Battle continues! Maki and Miwa face off, but Miwa can't hide her surprise at the overwhelming strength Maki displays despite her grade ranking. At the same time, Kugisaki pursues Nishimiya as she flies around on her broom. Nishimiya talks about Mai's hardships and what it's like to live as a female jujutsu sorcerer, but Kugisaki cuts her off and counterattacks. Then Mai reveals herself

programme.title: Jujutsu Kaisen Season 1 Episode 18
programme.desc: Battles are starting to be decided in different locations on the first day of the Exchange Event. Fushiguro faces off against Kamo, the heir to one of the three major clans. Kamo uses Blood Manipulation, a technique that controls his own blood, while Fushiguro fights him with shikigami and martial arts

programme.title: Jujutsu Kaisen Season 1 Episode 19
programme.desc: The special grade cursed spirit, Hanami, suddenly intrudes on the Exchange Event. Fushiguro, Inumaki, and Kamo face off against Hanami, defending themselves as they race to cross the veil. The three are driven into a corner when Maki joins the fight and strings together a chain of attacks in combination with Fushiguro. However, even with that, they're still forced into dire straits by Hanami's overwhelming prowess.

programme.title: Jujutsu Kaisen Season 1 Episode 20
programme.desc: Itadori and Todo join the battle against Hanami. Itadori lands his Black Flash, and his Todo unleashes his cursed technique as they keep up their combo attack. Alongside his "brother", Itadori, Todo overwhelms Hanami with his tricky cursed technique and his clever, (self-proclaimed) 530,000 IQ mental CPU,

programme.title: Jujutsu Kaisen Season 1 Episode 21
programme.desc: Gojo has driven Hanami away with his overwhelming strength. Mahito reunites with Hanami, who's on the verge of death, after stealing Sukuna's fingers and the Special Grade Cursed Object, Death Painting Wombs 1 through 3. They're steadily making progress with their preparations to seal Gojo Satoru on October 31st. Meanwhile, those with Jujutsu High are unable to discern the cursed spirits' objective.

programme.title: Jujutsu Kaisen Season 1 Episode 22
programme.desc: Three men have died under similar circumstances from a cursed spirit. Investigators discover the victims all attended the same middle school, so Itadori, Fushiguro, and Kugisaki are dispatched to investigate. Once they arrive, they learn it was Fushiguro's old middle school. There they learn that the victims were all found unconscious beneath Yasohachi Bridge, a local haunted location. They also learn that Fushiguro's older sister, Tsumiki, is caught up in this incident as well

programme.title: Jujutsu Kaisen Season 1 Episode 23
programme.desc: In addition to the curse of Yasohachi Bridge, Itadori, Fushiguro, and Kugisaki face off against Kechizu, one of the special grade cursed objects: Cursed Wombs: Death Paintings. The three start fighting within the barrier of Yasohachi Bridge's curse, but something suddenly seizes Kugisaki's arm and drags her outside the barrier. Itadori and Kechizu chase after her, leaving the barrier. Left behind, Fushiguro quickly takes of the Yasohachi Bridge curse--until he witnesses a shocking sight.

programme.title: Jujutsu Kaisen Season 1 Episode 24
programme.desc: The Cursed Wombs: Death Paintings, Eso and Kechizu, face off against Itadori and Kugisaki, but the two begin to rot after they're bathed in the blood of Eso and Kechizu. Driven into a corner, Kugisaki hammers a nail into herself to activate Resonance and start a game of chicken with the brothers. Itadori refuses to stop and continues to attack Kechizu, but-- This whole mission began with one of Ryomen Sukuna's

programme.title: Solo Leveling Season 1 Episode 10
programme.desc: After the battle with Kang Taeshik, Jinwoo survives the tragedy once again. However, Woo Jinchul warns him that Hwang Dongsoo, an S-rank hunter, may be after Jinwoo's life.

programme.title: Solo Leveling Season 1 Episode 11
programme.desc: Out of the blue, a "job-change quest" pops up in Jinwoo's window. Feeling that it may help him get stronger, Jinwoo sets foot into a gate.

programme.title: Solo Leveling Season 1 Episode 12
programme.desc: Despite being cornered, Jinwoo manages to defeat the Crimson Knight, Igris. Without a moment of respite, another window pops up to announce a new quest.

programme.title: My Hero Academia Season 1 Episode 1
programme.desc: Izuku Midoriya desperately wants to be a hero, but he is one of the few in his generation born without a Quirk. Will meeting the number one hero, All Might, change his fate?

programme.title: My Hero Academia Season 1 Episode 2
programme.desc: Izuku accidentally learns of All Might's secret, but there's trouble in town again before Izuku has time to process it. Will All Might be able to save the day again?

programme.title: My Hero Academia Season 1 Episode 3
programme.desc: All Might tells Izuku that he can become a hero, but does he really have what it takes to become one?

programme.title: My Hero Academia Season 1 Episode 4
programme.desc: At the entrance exam, Izuku falls behind as the other students defeat faux villains left and right. Will he be able to get enough points to pass?

programme.title: My Hero Academia Season 1 Episode 5
programme.desc: It's Izuku's first day of high school, and he still can't control his new Quirk. Will he make it to the second day of school with his eccentric new teacher?

programme.title: My Hero Academia Season 1 Episode 6
programme.desc: Izuku somehow gets through his first day of school and falls into a regular schedule of classes and training at U.A. In their first class with All Might

programme.title: My Hero Academia Season 1 Episode 7
programme.desc: Izuku is up against Katsuki in their first class with All Might! Can he and Uraraka beat the villain team of Katsuki and Tenya before time runs out?

programme.title: My Hero Academia Season 1 Episode 8
programme.desc: After the combat training lesson, the students and All Might reflect on their matches as they think about their next steps.

programme.title: My Hero Academia Season 1 Episode 9
programme.desc: Class 1-A has to elect a class representative, and everyone wants the job! How will they choose? And what lies in wait for them at the next class?

programme.title: My Hero Academia Season 1 Episode 10
programme.desc: Villains have attacked USJ, and it's up to Class 1-A to stop them. What are the villains after? Will All Might be able to save the day again?

programme.title: My Hero Academia Season 1 Episode 11
programme.desc: The students of Class 1-A are up against the League of Villains. Will they survive long enough for help to arrive?

programme.title: My Hero Academia Season 1 Episode 12
programme.desc: All Might has finally shown up, but will he be able to defeat Nomu and save the day?!

programme.title: My Hero Academia Season 1 Episode 13
programme.desc: As the battle at USJ winds down, Izuku and All Might think about its repercussions. Meanwhile, the villains slink home to plan their next move.

programme.title: Jujutsu Kaisen Season 1 Episode 1
programme.desc: Ryomen Sukuna

programme.title: Jujutsu Kaisen Season 1 Episode 2
programme.desc: Itadori wakes up in an unfamiliar room and before him rests Gojo Satoru, a teacher at Jujutsu High, who declares Itadori's secret execution has been decided upon. Gojo presents Itadori with two options. He can be executed immediately, or he can hunt down all 20 of Ryomen Sukuna's fingers and die after absorbing all of them...

programme.title: Jujutsu Kaisen Season 1 Episode 3
programme.desc: Itadori, Fushiguro, and Gojo head out to meet up with the third first year, Kugizaki Nobara. Thereafter they head to an abandoned building where Gojo tasks Itadori and Kugizaki with exorcising the curses lurking inside. Once inside the building Itadori and Kugizaki split up to look for the curses and Kugizaki faces off against a cunning curse that takes a child hostage.

programme.title: Jujutsu Kaisen Season 1 Episode 4
programme.desc: An emergency breaks out at a juvenile detention center and Itadori, Fushiguro, and Kugisaki are dispatched to handle it. Their mission is to verify and rescue any survivors left inside with the curse womb that could develop into a special grade cursed spirit. Itadori and the others storm in to find a merciless reality waiting for them. Immediately thereafter, Kugisaki disappears and the special grade cursed spirit appears beside Itadori and Fushiguro.

programme.title: Jujutsu Kaisen Season 1 Episode 5
programme.desc: After retreating outside the juvenile detention center, Fushiguro notices the death of the special grade cursed spirit. The very next moment Ryomen Sukuna appears beside him, and rips Itadori's heart from his body to take him hostage. Fushiguro begins fighting Sukuna to prevent Itadori from dying when he regains control, but he becomes painfully aware of the difference in their strength

programme.title: Jujutsu Kaisen Season 1 Episode 6
programme.desc: Gojo stews in his frustration over Itadori's death. Both Fushiguro and Nobara are depressed by their teammate's death, but they begin their special training with the second year students to get stronger. Meanwhile, Geto and the others begin to make their move. And during all of that, the dead Itadori...

programme.title: Jujutsu Kaisen Season 1 Episode 7
programme.desc: While in transit Gojo is suddenly attacked by the special grade cursed spirit Jogo. After launching several attacks that never hit--Jogo comes face to face with Gojo's strength. In an instant Gojo returns to Jujutsu High and easily picks up mid-training Itadori which causes Jogo's anger to erupt. He takes his next move, to which Gojo

programme.title: Jujutsu Kaisen Season 1 Episode 8
programme.desc: While they're training for the exchange event, Kugisaki and Fushiguro come face to face with Kyoto's Jujutsu High second years - Zen'in Mai and Todo - who challenge them to a fight. Todo overwhelms Fushiguro with physical strength. Meanwhile, Kugisaki is disgusted by Mai's comments and says something to provoke her

programme.title: Jujutsu Kaisen Season 1 Episode 9
programme.desc: Yoshino Junpei skips school to go to a movie theater, but then he witnesses the classmates who bullied him getting their faces transfigured and dying. He chases after the culprit and calls out to them. Later, Itadori and the ex-salaryman first-grade jujutsu sorcerer, Nanami Kento, storm into the scene of the crime within the theater and encounter two cursed spirits.

programme.title: Jujutsu Kaisen Season 1 Episode 10
programme.desc: Itadori is placed in charge of investigating Yoshino, so he turns to his assistant supervisor, Ijichi for a plan. Their plan to have a low-level curse attack Yoshino and gauge his response fails, so Itadori speaks to him directly. After watching Itadori ultimately drive away the teacher he hated, Yoshino decides to hear him out. Meanwhile, Nanami has pinned down Mahito's base and he delves into the underground sewers to face Mahito.

programme.title: Jujutsu Kaisen Season 1 Episode 11
programme.desc: Mahito corners Nanami, but he releases the limiter on his cursed energy, destroying the wall of the underground channel with Ratio Technique: Collapse, and causing rubble to rain down upon them. Meanwhile, Itadori makes contact with Yoshino and they hit it off after talking about movies. He meets Yoshino's mother, and after being invited into their home, more is revealed...

programme.title: Jujutsu Kaisen Season 1 Episode 12
programme.desc: Mahito deftly uses Yoshino's admiration toward him to make him fight Itadori. Yoshino races toward vengeance and Itadori exchanges blows with him to try and make him explain his motive, which leads to him learning the cruel truth from Yoshino's lips.

programme.title: Jujutsu Kaisen Season 1 Episode 13
programme.desc: Nanami steps in at the last second to save Itadori from Mahito's blow. Then Itadori and Nanami match their attacks together to ensure they can exorcise Mahito. Mahito pulls out his transfigured humans in an attempt to mentally drive Itadori into a corner, but Itadori manages to overcome them. As Mahito grows trapped under their rain of blows he senses his pending death

programme.title: Jujutsu Kaisen Season 1 Episode 14
programme.desc: After escaping from Itadori and Nanami, Mojito reunites with Geto and the others to try and move their plan forward. Meanwhile, Jujutsu High is about to host its Kyoto Sister School Exchange Event. Fushiguro, Kugisaki and the second years Maki, Toge, and Panda all meet up to greet Todo and the other Kyoto students on arrival. Sparks immediately start to fly when Gojo rushes in late to the meetup and presents his surprise

programme.title: Jujutsu Kaisen Season 1 Episode 15
programme.desc: The Kyoto Sister School Exchange Event's group battle begins. Kyoto's Todo rushes to attack the Tokyo students, but Itadori takes on the role of stopping him and faces off against him. Itadori's overwhelmed by Todo's power, but suddenly Todo asks him what kind of woman is his type

programme.title: Jujutsu Kaisen Season 1 Episode 16
programme.desc: Todo points out that Itadori's Divergent Fist is a technique that won't work against special grades. When Itadori genuinely accepts his advice, Todo decides to face him and guide him with his full might. Meanwhile, Kugisaki picks a fight with Kyoto's Nishimiya. From the sidelines Mechamaru fires an attack at Panda, sparking the start of their battles with Kugisaki against Nishimiya and Panda against Mechamaru.

programme.title: Jujutsu Kaisen Season 1 Episode 17
programme.desc: The Exchange Event's Group Battle continues! Maki and Miwa face off, but Miwa can't hide her surprise at the overwhelming strength Maki displays despite her grade ranking. At the same time, Kugisaki pursues Nishimiya as she flies around on her broom. Nishimiya talks about Mai's hardships and what it's like to live as a female jujutsu sorcerer, but Kugisaki cuts her off and counterattacks. Then Mai reveals herself

programme.title: Jujutsu Kaisen Season 1 Episode 18
programme.desc: Battles are starting to be decided in different locations on the first day of the Exchange Event. Fushiguro faces off against Kamo, the heir to one of the three major clans. Kamo uses Blood Manipulation, a technique that controls his own blood, while Fushiguro fights him with shikigami and martial arts

programme.title: Jujutsu Kaisen Season 1 Episode 19
programme.desc: The special grade cursed spirit, Hanami, suddenly intrudes on the Exchange Event. Fushiguro, Inumaki, and Kamo face off against Hanami, defending themselves as they race to cross the veil. The three are driven into a corner when Maki joins the fight and strings together a chain of attacks in combination with Fushiguro. However, even with that, they're still forced into dire straits by Hanami's overwhelming prowess.

programme.title: Jujutsu Kaisen Season 1 Episode 20
programme.desc: Itadori and Todo join the battle against Hanami. Itadori lands his Black Flash, and his Todo unleashes his cursed technique as they keep up their combo attack. Alongside his "brother", Itadori, Todo overwhelms Hanami with his tricky cursed technique and his clever, (self-proclaimed) 530,000 IQ mental CPU,

programme.title: Jujutsu Kaisen Season 1 Episode 21
programme.desc: Gojo has driven Hanami away with his overwhelming strength. Mahito reunites with Hanami, who's on the verge of death, after stealing Sukuna's fingers and the Special Grade Cursed Object, Death Painting Wombs 1 through 3. They're steadily making progress with their preparations to seal Gojo Satoru on October 31st. Meanwhile, those with Jujutsu High are unable to discern the cursed spirits' objective.

programme.title: Jujutsu Kaisen Season 1 Episode 22
programme.desc: Three men have died under similar circumstances from a cursed spirit. Investigators discover the victims all attended the same middle school, so Itadori, Fushiguro, and Kugisaki are dispatched to investigate. Once they arrive, they learn it was Fushiguro's old middle school. There they learn that the victims were all found unconscious beneath Yasohachi Bridge, a local haunted location. They also learn that Fushiguro's older sister, Tsumiki, is caught up in this incident as well

programme.title: Jujutsu Kaisen Season 1 Episode 23
programme.desc: In addition to the curse of Yasohachi Bridge, Itadori, Fushiguro, and Kugisaki face off against Kechizu, one of the special grade cursed objects: Cursed Wombs: Death Paintings. The three start fighting within the barrier of Yasohachi Bridge's curse, but something suddenly seizes Kugisaki's arm and drags her outside the barrier. Itadori and Kechizu chase after her, leaving the barrier. Left behind, Fushiguro quickly takes of the Yasohachi Bridge curse--until he witnesses a shocking sight.

programme.title: Jujutsu Kaisen Season 1 Episode 24
programme.desc: The Cursed Wombs: Death Paintings, Eso and Kechizu, face off against Itadori and Kugisaki, but the two begin to rot after they're bathed in the blood of Eso and Kechizu. Driven into a corner, Kugisaki hammers a nail into herself to activate Resonance and start a game of chicken with the brothers. Itadori refuses to stop and continues to attack Kechizu, but-- This whole mission began with one of Ryomen Sukuna's

programme.title: Solo Leveling Season 1 Episode 1
programme.desc: Over a decade ago, a pathway called a "gate" appeared, which connected this world to another dimension. People called those who fought against the monsters on the other side of the gate "hunters."

programme.title: Red Riding Hood
programme.desc: Set in a medieval village that is haunted by a werewolf, a young girl falls for an orphaned woodcutter, much to her family's displeasure.

programme.title: Fast Charlie
programme.desc: For twenty years, Charlie Swift has been a fixer and hitman for a mob boss named Stan. After a rival boss puts a hit on Stan and his crew, Charlie is the sole survivor. Charlie decides to avenge his friend.

programme.title: Underworld
programme.desc: Selene, a vampire warrior, is entrenched in a conflict between vampires and werewolves, while falling in love with Michael, a human who is sought by werewolves for unknown reasons.

programme.title: Underworld: Evolution
programme.desc: Picking up directly from the previous movie, vampire warrior Selene and the half werewolf Michael hunt for clues to reveal the history of their races and the war between them.

programme.title: Mr. Right
programme.desc: A girl falls for the "perfect" guy, who happens to have a very fatal flaw: he's a hitman on the run from the crime cartels who employ him.

programme.title: Don Jon
programme.desc: A New Jersey guy dedicated to his family, friends, and church, develops unrealistic expectations from watching porn and works to find happiness and intimacy with his potential true love.

programme.title: The Secret Scripture
programme.desc: A woman keeps a diary of her extended stay at a mental hospital.

programme.title: Hirokin
programme.desc: Hirokin, a reluctant hero marked by a dark past, must fulfill his destiny when forced to choose between avenging the murder of his family or fighting for the freedom of a people long abused.

programme.title: The Zero Theorem
programme.desc: A hugely talented but socially isolated computer operator is tasked by Management to prove the Zero Theorem: that the universe ends as nothing, rendering life meaningless. But meaning is what he already craves.

programme.title: Out for A Kill
programme.desc: An unsuspecting university professor is an unwitting accomplice in a foiled Chinese cocaine deal. Wrongly imprisoned, he escapes to take his revenge and prove his innocence.

programme.title: Cat.8: Night 1
programme.desc: An untested global defence system triggers a swarm of devastating solar flares, resulting in catastrophic earthquakes and ferocious magnetic storms; an unprecedented CAT. 8 Armageddon. Can we stop the annihilation of the human race?

programme.title: Cat.8: Night 2
programme.desc: Much to the world's surprise, the sun releases a gigantic coronal mass ejection, as the elite task force of the dangerous secretary of defence is hot on Ranger and Whitlow's trail. They are mankind's last hope. Can they save us once more?

programme.title: The Mechanic
programme.desc: An elite hitman teaches his trade to an apprentice who has a connection to one of his previous victims.

programme.title: Charlie Countryman
programme.desc: While travelling abroad, a guy falls for a Romanian beauty whose unreachable heart has its origins in her violent, charismatic ex.

programme.title: Generation Um...
programme.desc: Three adults during a single day in New York City filled with sex, drugs, and indecision.

programme.title: The Order
programme.desc: A playboy criminal contacts his dad after stealing a Faberge egg. Later it seems his dad has gone missing in Israel so he heads there. His disappearance is linked to the religious sect: The Order. Lots of fight and chase scenes.

programme.title: The Peacekeeper
programme.desc: When a terrorist group steals the US President's personal communications computer for launching the US arsenal in case of war, only a heroic Major has the key to prevent a Presidential assassination or a nuclear holocaust.

programme.title: The Philly Kid
programme.desc: A former NCAA champion wrestler, paroled after ten years in prison, agrees to a series of cage fights to save a friend's life and is asked to do the impossible - lose.

programme.title: 1275 Days
programme.desc: 15-year-old Blake faces life in prison for felony murder after a botched home invasion. His single mom and girlfriend support his David vs. Goliath legal battle in Elkhart, Indiana, seeking a second chance.

programme.title: Kill Craft
programme.desc: Marina lives with her disabled mother and her hit man father. When he dies at work, she must take charge of the family business and take care of her mother. Marked to die, Marina must navigate the world of assassins to survive.

programme.title: The Last Champion
programme.desc: When his mother dies, scandal-ridden ex-Olympian John Wright returns to a hometown that has not forgiven him.

programme.title: Notorious Nick
programme.desc: Nick Newell, a one-armed MMA fighter, gets a rare chance to fight for the lightweight championship. He strives to win for himself and all the other people in the world with physical challenges.

programme.title: Crank: High Voltage
programme.desc: Chelios faces a Chinese mobster who has stolen his nearly indestructible heart and replaced it with a battery-powered ticker which requires regular jolts of electricity to keep working.

programme.title: Men of War
programme.desc: A former Special Ops soldier leads a group of mercenaries to an island in the South China Sea: their mission is obtain the rights to the unusual treasure that the island beholds.

programme.title: Mercenary for Justice
programme.desc: A mercenary gets involved in a mission that threatens the lives of his kin. In order to succeed, he must break into one of the most well guarded prisons in Eastern Europe and free the son of the most notorious drug lord in the world today.

programme.title: Ninja
programme.desc: A westerner named Casey, studying Ninjutsu in Japan, is asked by the Sensei to return to New York to protect the legendary Yoroi Bitsu, an armored chest that contains the weapons of the last Koga Ninja.
