programme.title: Z Nation Season 3 Episode 2
programme.desc: In this epic "flashback movie," the gang protects the town against a new enemy known as The Man. Part 2.

programme.title: Z Nation Season 3 Episode 3
programme.desc: Warren and the group are taken prisoner while Murphy manages to escape with his newly formed group of blends.

programme.title: Z Nation Season 3 Episode 4
programme.desc: Murphy's mission gains momentum as he works to establish a new headquarters in Spokane.

programme.title: Z Nation Season 3 Episode 5
programme.desc: As more people flock to Murphy's new cult, Dr. Merch works on a blend vaccine.

programme.title: Z Nation Season 3 Episode 6
programme.desc: Alone and suffering from the effects of Merch's booster, 10K barely escapes Murphy and is stalked by a blend.

programme.title: Z Nation Season 3 Episode 7
programme.desc: Doc finds himself taken captive by a psychotic nurse and her surviving mental patients.

programme.title: Z Nation Season 3 Episode 8
programme.desc: The Man attempts to kidnap Murphy but underestimates the strength of Murphy's followers

programme.title: Z Nation Season 3 Episode 9
programme.desc: Looking for Lucy, Doc and Addy run into Skeezy and Sketch, who is running for "President of the Apocalypse."

programme.title: Z Nation Season 3 Episode 10
programme.desc: Warren realizes the gravity of extracting Murphy and finds an old ally in El Escorpion.

programme.title: Z Nation Season 3 Episode 11
programme.desc: Doc and Addy try to convince Lucy's family to follow them. Murphy tests 10K's allegiance.

programme.title: Z Nation Season 3 Episode 12
programme.desc: Doc tries to find a way to communicate with Warren but instead encounters something much more menacing.

programme.title: Z Nation Season 3 Episode 13
programme.desc: Warren leads an attack against Murphytown to extract its smug leader.

programme.title: Z Nation Season 3 Episode 14
programme.desc: Addy is being pummeled with whatever The Man can throw at her and Lucy does the same right back.

programme.title: Z Nation Season 3 Episode 15
programme.desc: Addy and Doc catch up with Warren, but the reunion is short-lived as the group faces the biggest battle yet.

programme.title: 1275 Days
programme.desc: 15-year-old Blake faces life in prison for felony murder after a botched home invasion. His single mom and girlfriend support his David vs. Goliath legal battle in Elkhart, Indiana, seeking a second chance.

programme.title: My Father Die
programme.desc: Deaf since having his hearing knocked out at the age of 12, Asher has been training for almost two decades to avenge himself on Ivan, the man that killed his older brother, 21 years ago. And now that his nemesis is out of prison, he gets his chance. But Asher's target also happens to be his father.

programme.title: Prom Night
programme.desc: On prom night, a masked killer stalks teenagers responsible for the accidental death of a girl years earlier. With scream queen Jamie Lee Curtis ("Halloween") and Leslie Nielsen ("Airplane!").

programme.title: Scorcher
programme.desc: The only hope for humanity to survive a natural disaster is to detonate a nuclear bomb in Los Angeles, California

programme.title: Z Nation Season 3 Episode 11
programme.desc: Doc and Addy try to convince Lucy's family to follow them. Murphy tests 10K's allegiance.

programme.title: Z Nation Season 3 Episode 12
programme.desc: Doc tries to find a way to communicate with Warren but instead encounters something much more menacing.

programme.title: Z Nation Season 3 Episode 14
programme.desc: Addy is being pummeled with whatever The Man can throw at her and Lucy does the same right back.

programme.title: Z Nation Season 3 Episode 15
programme.desc: Addy and Doc catch up with Warren, but the reunion is short-lived as the group faces the biggest battle yet.

programme.title: Z Nation Season 4 Episode 1
programme.desc: Two years later, things have gotten worse: Warren's apocalyptic dreams continue while the group fights MAD-Zs.

programme.title: Z Nation Season 4 Episode 2
programme.desc: Driven by her dream of a black rainbow and flesh-eating rain, Warren and Murphy escape Zona.

programme.title: Z Nation Season 4 Episode 3
programme.desc: When Sun Mei and Red vanish, the group must decide whether to keep looking for them or press on to Newmerica.

programme.title: Z Nation Season 4 Episode 4
programme.desc: Following Warren's dream, the team doesn't stop while crossing a seemingly endless landscape of destruction.

programme.title: Z Nation Season 4 Episode 5
programme.desc: The team is captured by a mysterious entity and enslaved in an elaborate underground facility.

programme.title: Z Nation Season 4 Episode 6
programme.desc: Lucy fights to save Murphy's life, while Warren and the others battle a biologically modified zombie.

programme.title: Z Nation Season 4 Episode 7
programme.desc: Warren is unable to stop Murphy and the others from committing an atrocity as misplaced revenge.

programme.title: Z Nation Season 4 Episode 8
programme.desc: Warren and the group encounter a mysterious stranger who they think is a grave robber.

programme.title: Z Nation Season 4 Episode 9
programme.desc: The group explores an abandoned TV station while seeking a way to contact Kaya at camp Northern Light.

programme.title: Z Nation Season 4 Episode 10
programme.desc: In Chicago, Doc and Murphy encounter a mysterious and murderous group, including Sketchy and Skeezy.

programme.title: Z Nation Season 4 Episode 11
programme.desc: The group returns to Mercy Labs, where they first met The Man, to retrieve another item from Warren's dreams.

programme.title: Z Nation Season 4 Episode 12
programme.desc: At Mount Weather, the group learns the thumb print of the president is necessary to achieve Warren's goal.

programme.title: Z Nation Season 4 Episode 13
programme.desc: The team arrives in Washington, D.C. and the secret of Warren's dreams is revealed.

programme.title: Harry's Case
programme.desc: Once at the top of the heap, former Bay Street lawyer Harry Wolfe now scrapes out a living as an unregistered private investigator. A dis-barred loser in everyone's eyes, Harry clings to the shred of hope that he'll prove his law partners set him up to take the fall that destroyed his life.

programme.title: Mortuary
programme.desc: A family moves to a small town in California where they plan on starting a new life while running a long-abandoned funeral home. The locals fear the place, which is suspected to be on haunted ground.

programme.title: Foolproof
programme.desc: Kevin, Sam and Rob are founding members of a theoretical group which pulls off heists. Leo, a gangster, blackmails them into pulling off a real multi-million dollar heist. Now it's up to them to get out alive.

programme.title: Lilly's Light: The Movie
programme.desc: When two curious members of Lilly's crew discover "The Big Book of Little Adventures" in the lighthouse basement, the adventure begins.

programme.title: Problem Child
programme.desc: A young boy just short of a monster is adopted by a loving man and his wacky wife. The laughs keep coming as he pushes them to the limits.

programme.title: Leap year
programme.desc: Anna Brady plans to travel to Dublin, Ireland to propose to her boyfriend Jeremy on February 29, leap day, because, according to Irish tradition, a man who receives a marriage proposal on a leap day must accept it.

programme.title: Couples Retreat
programme.desc: A comedy centered around four couples who settle into a tropical-island resort for a vacation. While one of the couples is there to work on the marriage, the others fail to realize that participation in the resort's therapy sessions is not optional.

programme.title: Hard Target
programme.desc: A woman hires a drifter as her guide through New Orleans in search of her missing father. In the process, they discover a deadly game of cat and mouse behind his disappearance.

programme.title: The Thing
programme.desc: A research team in Antarctica is hunted by a shape-shifting alien that assumes the appearance of its victims.

programme.title: The Fate of the Furious

programme.title: Fifty Shades Darker
programme.desc: While Christian wrestles with his inner demons, Anastasia must confront the anger and envy of the women who came before her.

programme.title: Fat Camp
programme.desc: When Hutch is kicked out of the house and forced to work at his uncle's fat camp, he finds himself supervising an offbeat group of husky boys, who ultimately help him grow up.

programme.title: Land of the Lost
programme.desc: A space-time vortex sucks scientist Rick Marshall, his assistant Holly and a survivalist Will into a world populated by dinosaurs and painfully slow creatures called Sleestaks.

programme.title: A Kiss Before Dying
programme.desc: Jonathan Corliss murders his girlfriend Dorothy and moves onto her twin sister Ellen who grows suspicious of her new lover as he charms his way into their family and impresses their father Thor Carlsson. Based on Ira Levin's novel.

programme.title: Schindler's List
programme.desc: In German-occupied Poland during World War II, industrialist Oskar Schindler gradually becomes concerned for his Jewish workforce after witnessing their persecution by the Nazis.

programme.title: Fifty Shades Freed
programme.desc: Anastasia and Christian get married, but Jack Hyde continues to threaten their relationship.

programme.title: Land of the Lost
programme.desc: A space-time vortex sucks scientist Rick Marshall, his assistant Holly and a survivalist Will into a world populated by dinosaurs and painfully slow creatures called Sleestaks.

programme.title: A Kiss Before Dying

programme.title: Schindler's List
programme.desc: In German-occupied Poland during World War II, industrialist Oskar Schindler gradually becomes concerned for his Jewish workforce after witnessing their persecution by the Nazis.

programme.title: Fifty Shades Freed
programme.desc: Anastasia and Christian get married, but Jack Hyde continues to threaten their relationship.

programme.title: 2 Guns
programme.desc: Two hardened criminals get into trouble with the US border patrol after meeting with a Mexican drug lord, and then revelations start to unfold.

programme.title: Fair Game (1989)
programme.desc: Gene, a clever but seriously deranged computer-game designer, has been left by his wife Eva. Unable to win her back, he decides to take revenge by locking Eva in her new apartment, inside which he has released a deadly mamba snake.

programme.title: The Turning
programme.desc: A young governess is hired to look after an orphaned girl, but the return of the girl's problematic brother uncovers secrets from their past.

programme.title: Without Remorse
programme.desc: An elite Navy SEAL goes on a path to avenge his wife's murder only to find himself inside of a larger conspiracy.

programme.title: HAIKYU!! The movie: The Battle of Concepts
programme.desc: Compilation film of the third season of the anime Haikyu!! (2014).

programme.title: Bullet Train
programme.desc: Five assassins aboard a swiftly-moving bullet train find out that their missions have something in common.

programme.title: The Tomorrow War
programme.desc: A family man is drafted to fight in a future war where the fate of humanity relies on his ability to confront the past.

programme.title: Brightburn
programme.desc: What if a child from another world crash-landed on Earth, but instead of becoming a hero to mankind, he proved to be something far more sinister?

programme.title: Hanna (2011)
programme.desc: A sixteen-year-old girl who was raised by her father to be the perfect assassin is dispatched on a mission across Europe, tracked by a ruthless intelligence agent and her operatives.

programme.title: Croc
programme.desc: A huge man-eating crocodile terrorizes people near Krabi, Thailand. A hunter stalks the beast, while a local tries to blame a foreign crocodile-farm owner for the crocodile's rampage.

programme.title: The Covenant (2006)
programme.desc: The death of a student at an elite academy in New England threatens the centuries-old secret of four families.

programme.title: Vipers
programme.desc: A set of vipers has been taken by the scientists, when the vipers escape into the woods, they do more than just bite.

programme.title: The Outfit
programme.desc: An expert cutter must outwit a dangerous group of mobsters in order to survive a fateful night.

programme.title: Hercules (2014)
programme.desc: Having endured his legendary twelve labors, Hercules, the Greek demigod, has his life as a sword-for-hire tested when the King of Thrace and his daughter seek his aid in defeating a tyrannical warlord.

programme.title: The Ice Man
programme.desc: The story of Richard Kuklinski, the notorious contract killer and family man. When he was finally arrested in 1986, neither his wife nor his daughters had any clue about his real profession.

programme.title: Vertical Limit
programme.desc: A climber must rescue his sister on the peak of K2, the second highest mountain in the world .

programme.title: The Caretaker
programme.desc: Eddie is mute, he takes a caretaker job at the coastal Lockbridge Academy to avoid homelessness. There, he forms a bond with cleaner Marie, while uncovering dark secrets that threaten the Aberdeen family's control of the school.

programme.title: Agent Recon
programme.desc: Alastair, the captain of a covert Earth security force, calls in super-powered rookie Jim to join a mission led by Colonel Green and his skilled Marines to track down a mysterious energy disturbance at a base in New Mexico.

programme.title: The Birthday Cake
programme.desc: On the 10th anniversary of his father's death, Giovanni reluctantly accepts the task of bringing a cake to the home of his uncle, a mob boss, for a celebration. Just two hours into the night, Gio's life is forever changed.

programme.title: Halloween Kills
programme.desc: Surviving victims of Michael Myers form a vigilante mob and vow to end his reign of terror.

programme.title: Cyborg
programme.desc: A martial artist hunts a killer in a plague-infested urban dump of the future.

programme.title: I Know What You Did Last Summer
programme.desc: Four young friends bound by a tragic accident are reunited when they find themselves being stalked by a hook-wielding maniac in their small seaside town.

programme.title: Resident Evil: Vendetta
programme.desc: Chris Redfield enlists the help of Leon S. Kennedy and Rebecca Chambers to stop a death merchant from spreading a deadly virus in New York.

programme.title: Rocky III
programme.desc: Rocky faces the ultimate challenge from a powerful new contender, and must turn to a former rival to help regain his throne as the undisputed fighting champion.

programme.title: Jarhead 3: The Siege
programme.desc: A group of Marines must protect a US Embassy in the Middle East when it suddenly comes under attack from enemy forces.

programme.title: Captain Phillips
programme.desc: The true story of Captain Richard Phillips and the 2009 hijacking by Somali pirates of the U.S.-flagged MV Maersk Alabama, the first American cargo ship to be hijacked in two hundred years.

programme.title: Salt
programme.desc: A CIA agent goes on the run after a defector accuses her of being a Russian spy.

programme.title: Ghostbusters: Afterlife
programme.desc: When a single mom and her two kids arrive in a small town, they begin to discover their connection to the original Ghostbusters and the secret legacy their grandfather left behind.

programme.title: Sonic The Hedgehog
programme.desc: Taking refuge on Earth, when Sonic uses his incredible speed and accidentally knock out the power in part of the United States, he catches the attention of Dr. Robotnik and must stop him from using his unique power for world domination.

programme.title: Sleeping Giant
programme.desc: While spending the summer in cottage country on the shores of Lake Superior, three teens cope with boredom by testing the limits of their experience.

programme.title: Jumanji: Welcome to the Jungle
programme.desc: Four teenagers are sucked into a magical video game, and the only way they can escape is to work together to finish the game.

programme.title: Sound Of Metal
programme.desc: During a series of adrenaline-fueled gigs, itinerant punk-metal drummer Ruben begins to experience hearing loss. When a specialist tells him his condition will rapidly worsen, he thinks his music career - and with it his life - is over.

programme.title: Her Smell
programme.desc: A self-destructive punk rocker struggles with sobriety while trying to recapture the creative inspiration that led her band to success.

programme.title: Novitiate
programme.desc: Set in the early 1960s and during the era of Vatican II, a young woman in training to become a nun struggles with issues of faith, the changing church and sexuality.

programme.title: Tanner Hall
programme.desc: Tanner Hall is a vivid peek into the private world of an all-girls boarding school. In a cozy, but run-down New England, the knot of adolescent complexity is unraveled through the coming-of-age stories of four teenage girls.

programme.title: Cloudy With A Chance of Meatballs
programme.desc: A local scientist is often regarded as a failure until he invents a machine that can make food fall from the sky. But little does he know that things are about to take a turn for the worst.

programme.title: Erin Brockovich
programme.desc: A flamboyant law firm secretary works tirelessly to gain justice for a small town wrecked by a utility company's pollution.

programme.title: Son Of God
programme.desc: The life story of Jesus is told from his humble birth through his teachings, crucifixion and ultimate resurrection.

programme.title: Lords of Dogtown
programme.desc: The film follows the surf and skateboarding trends that originated in Venice, California during the 1970s.

programme.title: Hollywood On Set
programme.desc: Each week Hollywood On Set goes behind-the-scenes on three major motion pictures in production, featuring action footage and interviews with actors and filmmakers.

programme.title: Paw Patrol: The Movie
programme.desc: A magical meteor falls in Adventure City and gives the PAW Patrol superpowers, transforming them into the Mighty Pups. But they face their most powerful challenge when Humdinger teams up with a mad scientist to steal their powers.

programme.title: Dolittle
programme.desc: A physician who can talk to animals embarks on an adventure to find a legendary island with a young apprentice and a crew of strange pets.

programme.title: The Card Counter
programme.desc: William Tell is an ex-military interrogator living under the radar as a low-stakes gambler. When he encounters a young man looking to commit revenge against a mutual enemy, he takes him on the casino circuit to set him on a new path.

programme.title: Roadrunner: A Film About Anthony Bourdain
programme.desc: A documentary about Anthony Bourdain and his career as a chef, writer and host, revered and renowned for his authentic approach to food, culture and travel.

programme.title: Brooklyn's Finest
programme.desc: Three unconnected Brooklyn cops wind up at the same deadly location after enduring vastly different career paths.

programme.title: Belfast
programme.desc: A young boy and his working-class Belfast family experience the tumultuous late 1960s.

programme.title: Kung Fu Hustle
programme.desc: In Shanghai, China in the 1940s, a wannabe gangster aspires to join the notorious "Axe Gang" while residents of a housing complex exhibit extraordinary powers in defending their turf.

programme.title: Captain Underpants
programme.desc: Two overly-imaginative pranksters hypnotize their grumpy principal into thinking he's a ridiculously enthusiastic, incredibly dimwitted, underwear-themed superhero.

programme.title: MEMORIES OF THE SWORD
programme.desc: 3 warriors pledge to fight against an incompetent king. However, a betrayal occurs leading to the death of one of the warriors. 18 years later, the daughter of the betrayed sets out to get revenge.

programme.title: THE NOISY MANSION
programme.desc: Geo-ul moves into the mysterious apartment plagued by unexplained floor noise. Determined to solve the mystery, she faces unexpected challenges while uncovering the apartment's secrets.

programme.title: BEAR MAN
programme.desc: Two bears from the Institute of techonolgy have turned into humans after eating garlic and mugwort. Yet, one has grown up into a police, while one has become a gangster...

programme.title: LOVE MY SCENT
programme.desc: An ordinary man who has never known love, struggles to talk to his crush who goes to work on the same bus as him every day. Things started to change when he acquires a strange perfume that has the power to attract women...

programme.title: HANDSOME GUYS
programme.desc: Self-proclaimed tough guy Jae-Pil and sexy guy Sang-Gu move to a countryside home. A spirit sealed in the basement awakens, leading to a high-stimulus chilling comedy they'll never forget.

programme.title: VETERAN
programme.desc: A merciless detective hunts down a young and successful drug addict who always escapes from investigations with the help of his wealth and connections.

programme.title: MISS BAEK
programme.desc: A woman finds it difficult to shake off her ex-convict label, until she meets a girl whom she is determined to save.

programme.title: MAL-MO-E: THE SECRET MISSION
programme.desc: During the Japanese occupation in the 1940s, two men work together to secretly create a dictionary of the Korean language when the language was banned.

programme.title: SWITCH
programme.desc: The life of a top star actor was turned upside down when he meets a taxi driver on Christmas Eve.

programme.title: HIDDEN FACE
programme.desc: While Sung-jin is searching for his fiance Su-yeon, he meets her friend Mi-ju. A breathtaking thriller unfolds in which Su-yeon, who is trapped in a secret room, witnesses a naked truth.

programme.title: DR. CHEON AND THE LOST TALISMAN
programme.desc: Dr. Cheon is a fake exorcist who cannot see or hear any ghosts. One day, a woman comes to Dr. Cheon, asking him to save her possessed younger sister...

programme.title: FIST & FURIOUS
programme.desc: A former detective grants permission to a freelance video journalist to cover his revenge journey on a mob boss whom previously killed his partner during an investigation.

programme.title: SECRETLY, GREATLY
programme.desc: 3 North Korean spies who have been living and bonding in South Korea's community for years got the order to take their own life after a sudden power change in their government. What would they choose?

programme.title: INNOCENT WITNESS
programme.desc: A housekeeper is charged with murder. Her attorney is surprised to learn the only witness to the crime is a teenage girl with Asperger's. Will the girl be able to provide a valid statement?

programme.title: MIRACLE IN CELL NO.7
programme.desc: A mentally challenged father who's wrongly jailed for the murder of a young girl reunites with her young daughter in the prison.

programme.title: A HARD DAY
programme.desc: After trying to cover up a car accident that left a man dead, a crooked homicide detective is stalked by a mysterious man claiming to have witnessed the event.

programme.title: THE FACE READER
programme.desc: Nae-gyeong is the most skillful face reader in all of Joeson dynasty. After his abilities are acknowledged, he gets pulled into a royal power struggle involving the King's successor.

programme.title: MIRACLE IN CELL NO.7
programme.desc: A mentally challenged father who's wrongly jailed for the murder of a young girl reunites with her young daughter in the prison.

programme.title: THE NEGOTIATION

programme.title: Heart Of A Lion
programme.desc: Teppo, the leader of a gang of neo-nazis, falls in love with Sari. To his shock, Saris son is black, and Teppo finds his prejudices and loyalties pitted against his desire for love and family.

programme.title: A Childhood
programme.desc: As summer drags by, 13-year-old Jimmy, forced by circumstance to become an adult too soon, runs up against the limits of his small hometown and his turbulent life, caught between a mother on the slide and a stepfather who keeps her down.

programme.title: Puan
programme.desc: When Professor Marcelo Pena finally is about to be appointed Head of the Philosophy Department, the famous and seductive Professor Sujarchuk returns from Europe to claim the kingdom for himself.

programme.title: Ghost Town Anthology
programme.desc: Set in a small town in Quebec, the film centres on the inhabitants of the town who are struggling to cope after teenager Simon Dub is killed in a car accident. As the family and town grieve, the residents begin to report several ghost sightings.

programme.title: Murder in Ramatuelle
programme.desc: When wine estate owner Sbastien Lacassagne is found murdered in his home, Prosecutor Elisabeth Richard and Captain Caroline Martinez delve into his tangled past. As secrets unravel, a year-old disappearance emerges as the key to unlocking the truth.

programme.title: A Son
programme.desc: A familys holiday in Tunisia ends in disaster, when their 10-year-old son Aziz is shot during a terrorist ambush. At the hospital where Aziz is in desperate need of a transplant, the family discovers a long-buried secret.

programme.title: The Salvation Of The World As We Know It
programme.desc: After a suicide attempt, 17-year-old Paul is sent to a psychiatric centre by his father. There, he encounters other youths with issues just like him, one of whom is Toni.

programme.title: Black Snow
programme.desc: Gosha is a trucker in northern Yakutia, who supplies his community with food, alongside low quality vodka which contributes to their alcoholism. When his truck breaks down during one of his trips, he finds himself alone in the wilderness.

programme.title: Heart Of A Lion
programme.desc: Teppo, the leader of a gang of neo-nazis, falls in love with Sari. To his shock, Saris son is black, and Teppo finds his prejudices and loyalties pitted against his desire for love and family.

programme.title: Aurora
programme.desc: In this black comedy, a sanatorium isolated in the mountains becomes a microcosm of Kyrgyzstan; its residents comprise of a tourist, a TV host, a pervert, Chinese businessmen and drugged-up youths. Excised in linear time, reality dissolves into fantasy.

programme.title: Commitment Hasan
programme.desc: Farmer Hasan is at a crossroads between challenges and new opportunities. A high-voltage mast can end up in the middle of his fertile and cultivated land. But can this invasion of modernity be resolved now that the neighbouring plot is for sale?

programme.title: Murders on the Frioul Islands
programme.desc: When a renowned editor is found dead on stage during a play, young Captain Victor Mariani is put in charge of the case. But tensions rise and secrets surface when his father Pierre, a retired commissioner and old friend of the victim, joins the case.

programme.title: Deserted
programme.desc: While on assignment to the Sinai coast, Swedish photojournalist Ingrid is kidnapped by a group of Palestinian men and hidden in the desert. An unlikely love affair arises between Ingrid and one of her captors, Ali.

While overseeing renovations to her beach house in 1970s Chile, Carmens quiet life is upended when a priest asks her to hide a wounded fugitive. As she steps beyond her quiet life, Carmen is pulled into the undercurrents of a politically tumultuous Chile.

programme.title: FBI: International S2 - EP 20
programme.desc: The FBI's International Fly Team tracks and neutralizes threats against American citizens.

programme.title: Wheel Of Fortune S42 - EP 3
programme.desc: Ryan Seacrest takes over as the new host for the well-loved gameshow.

programme.title: Magic Moments! The 70s - EP1
programme.desc: Experience the magic of the 70s, where every beat was a spell and every song a timeless enchantment!

programme.title: Tony Blackburn's Pop Pin-Ups! - EP1
programme.desc: Tony's pulled out quite a list of pop pinups for 2 hours of indulgence. Bolan, Bowie, Cassidy, an Osmond, Abba girls, Rod, and ladies men Barry White and Demis Roussos. Phwoar!

programme.title: At The Copa! Top 25 - EP1

programme.title: A Son
programme.desc: A familys holiday in Tunisia ends in disaster, when their 10-year-old son Aziz is shot during a terrorist ambush. At the hospital where Aziz is in desperate need of a transplant, the family discovers a long-buried secret.

programme.title: Aurora
programme.desc: In this black comedy, a sanatorium isolated in the mountains becomes a microcosm of Kyrgyzstan; its residents comprise of a tourist, a TV host, a pervert, Chinese businessmen and drugged-up youths. Excised in linear time, reality dissolves into fantasy.

programme.title: Black Snow
programme.desc: Gosha is a trucker in northern Yakutia, who supplies his community with food, alongside low quality vodka which contributes to their alcoholism. When his truck breaks down during one of his trips, he finds himself alone in the wilderness.

programme.title: Murders on the Frioul Islands
programme.desc: When a renowned editor is found dead on stage during a play, young Captain Victor Mariani is put in charge of the case. But tensions rise and secrets surface when his father Pierre, a retired commissioner and old friend of the victim, joins the case.

programme.title: Bluebird
programme.desc: In small town Maine, a school bus driver becomes distracted during her end-of-day inspection and fails to notice a sleeping boy in the back of the bus. What happens next shatters the tranquillity of her small logging town.

programme.title: Commitment Hasan
programme.desc: Farmer Hasan is at a crossroads between challenges and new opportunities. A high-voltage mast can end up in the middle of his fertile and cultivated land. But can this invasion of modernity be resolved now that the neighbouring plot is for sale?

programme.title: For A Moment, Forever
programme.desc: A young popstar overwhelmed by fame meets a troubled ex-rocker teaching music to adolescents at a therapy centre. Both longing for love, they get closer as affection for music connects them, but shall they overcome the burdens of his past?

programme.title: Deserted
programme.desc: While on assignment to the Sinai coast, Swedish photojournalist Ingrid is kidnapped by a group of Palestinian men and hidden in the desert. An unlikely love affair arises between Ingrid and one of her captors, Ali.

programme.title: Patchwork Family
programme.desc: Christian is a divorced father who can only see his young daughter Vanessa every other weekend. When he meets the single mother Christine and decides to participate in a summer TV show, his whole life is turned upside down.

While overseeing renovations to her beach house in 1970s Chile, Carmens quiet life is upended when a priest asks her to hide a wounded fugitive. As she steps beyond her quiet life, Carmen is pulled into the undercurrents of a politically tumultuous Chile.

programme.title: Sarah Kohr: Ghosts Of The Past
programme.desc: Ex-gang leader Degen escapes prison after 19 years, putting inspector Sarah Kohr and prosecutor Anton Mehringer in danger. Unable to count on the authorities without risking their secrets, they must confront their pasts when Degen kidnaps Anton's son.

programme.title: La La La at Rock Bottom
programme.desc: After his release from prison, Shigeo loses his memory in a brutal attack. Taken in by Kasumi, he becomes the lead singer of a band and lives a new life- until memories of his dark past begin to return.

programme.title: Murder Up North: Sievers And the Black Angel
programme.desc: An attendee of an angel seminar has been found beaten to death. The case becomes personal for Sievers when suspicions fall on fellow participant Hanne Wegener whom he knows from his past. Feldmann has no choice but to conduct the investigation undercover.

programme.title: Pure White
programme.desc: Vural, a husband and a father who was raised in faith, leads a seemingly pious and conformist life. Yet, everything takes a sudden dark turn when he learns a truth that will force him to confront his views on religion and morality.
